articles.title: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.mainIdea: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped. Investors began to notice that Warren Buffett began being more conservative with the stock market three years ago, and that streak has continued even as the S&P 500 hit new peaks and beyond. He sold Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL), Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), VeriSign (NASDAQ:VRSN), DaVita (NYSE:DVA), D.R. Horton (NYSE:DHI), and Nucor (NYSE:NUE) as of Q3 2025. ...
